sentences.en: a stylized drawing of a house
sentences.cn: 用非写实手法画的一座房子

sentences.en: a stylized picture of the sun
sentences.cn: 用非写实手法画的太阳

sentences.en: Architecture An ornamental device , as in stonework or weaving , consisting of stylized vine leaves and tendrils.
sentences.cn: [建筑学]螺层:一种含有很风格化的藤叶和卷须的装饰结构, 如石制品或纺织品上.

sentences.en: Commander Wolffe's clone troopers have stylized wolf muzzles painted on their helmets.
sentences.cn: 沃尔佛指挥官手下的克隆人士兵在头盔上都绘有标志性的狼嘴图案.

sentences.en: Eventually this practice became more stylized and became known as rapping.
sentences.cn: 最终这实践变得更加风格化并且出名如敲击.

sentences.en: Here's one of the beautiful, stylized wheels on the Case traction engine.
sentences.cn: 这里是美丽的, 在风格轮为例牵引引擎之一.

sentences.en: In chapter 3, I discuss the definition, type, and some stylized facts of business cycles.
sentences.cn: 第三章介绍了经济周期性质 、 类型及其典型事实.

sentences.en: In Moby - Dick , Melville employs stylized language, symbolism, and metaphor to explore numerous complex themes.
sentences.cn: 梅维尔在这部小说中使用了别具一格的语言 、 象征和隐喻来探讨众多复杂的主题.

sentences.en: Lineage II clearly draws inspiration from Japanese animation, and its art design is stylized and consistent.
sentences.cn: 天堂二显然的从日式动画中得到很多启示, 而且美术设定相当的有风格而且一致.

sentences.en: Stylized forms of performance is the main characteristic of the Beijing Opera.
sentences.cn: 京剧的主要特点就是表演的程式化.

sentences.en: The gestures are highly stylized and symbolic.
sentences.cn: 各种姿势都是高度程式化的,并且具有高度象征意义.

sentences.en: There are 3 types of dithering: Basic dithering, stylized dithering and anti - aliasing.
sentences.cn: 一共有3种抖动: 基础的抖动,随机抖动, 抗锯齿.

sentences.en: These models are stylized and they omit many details.
sentences.cn: 模型是形式化的,人体的许多细节已经被忽略.

sentences.en: They say Chinese classical theater abounds in stylized conventions.
sentences.cn: 据说传统戏剧程式很多.

sentences.en: This paper analyzes the problem of Endogenous price discrimination and presents stylized structure models.
sentences.cn: 本文构建了多子市场内生价格歧视简约理论模型.

sentences.en: With these methods, Peng creates a personal and stylized art of painting for us.
sentences.cn: 彭麒用这些方法为我们创造了富有个性特征和风格样式的绘画作品.

words.tran_cn: 时髦的；现代风格的；潇洒的
体裁上的；格式上的；文体论的
设计式样；用刻刀作装饰画
使…风格化；效仿…的风格（等于stylize）
程式化的；按固定格式的

trans.tran_en: drawn, written, or performed in an artificial style that does not look natural or real, but that is still pleasant to look at

trans.tran_cn: 按固定的传统风格处理某事物( stylize的过去式)
